title: The Adventures of Bob Turner: The Guiding Light

story.text: Bob Turner discovers his ability to see few seconds into the future, an ability that kicks in whenever he senses danger. While guiding a group in the local park, he foresees a falling tree branch and saves a child just in time.

With newfound confidence in his abilities, Bob experiments with guiding his friends away from minor misfortunes, like narrowly avoiding a puddle splash or rerouting a morning jog to avoid construction noise.
Bob's smaller feats of guidance become talk of the town. His abilities begin to draw attention, both positive and negative. Curious locals follow him, hoping to catch him in action.
A local journalist catches wind of Bob's deeds and decides to follow him, documenting an entire day. This attention, while overwhelming, helps Bob realize the impact of his powers.
Bob decides to organize a community gathering to more formally offer his guiding services. He helps people avoid everyday nuisances, bringing smiles and relief to his neighbors.
A notorious schemer attempts to exploit Bob's abilities for personal gain. Bob foresees the deceit and turns the tables, guiding the schemer into the hands of law enforcement.
Reflecting on a week of heroics, Bob decides to use his powers full-time, becoming a local hero known as 'The Guiding Light'. He promises to protect and guide his community.

ending: Bob Turner continued to light the way, proving that sometimes, the best heroes are those who simply know the right path.
moral: True guidance comes from the desire to help others find their way, not control it.
